text: Let the splintered bones burrow from the grave pall. Let cold fingers grip tomb-worn blades, and unseeing eyes survey the fields of slaughter. For your time has come once more.
Arkhan calls forth a blast of Shyish energy to blast nearby foes!
The Necromancer can awaken mortal remains to reinforce the Undead legions under his control.
Necromancers can awaken mortal remains to reinforce their Undead legions.
